Topic.Title: [Dumb Question [SOLVED]]  How Do You Insert a Hyperlink into a Forum Post?

Posts.EditableText: So this is about a link in a forum posting, not about links in a Quest game...
Posts.HTML: So this is about a link in a forum posting, not about links in a Quest game...

Posts.EditableText:
If you just put the address in your post, it will get displayed as a link, even though it is not in the preview.

Otherwise, put the text users will see in square brackets, then the address in curved brackets (no space between them).
```
Just look [here](http://textadventures.co.uk/forum).
```
Looks like this:

Just look [here](http://textadventures.co.uk/forum).
Posts.HTML:
If you just put the address in your post, it will get displayed as a link, even though it is not in the preview.

Otherwise, put the text users will see in square brackets, then the address in curved brackets (no space between them).

Just look [here](http://textadventures.co.uk/forum).

Looks like this:
